extDesc.message: When you access github.com, automatically go to your profile (On/Off toggle, status tooltip, default ON)

profileOn.message:
Go To My Profile (ON)
Status: ON
Click to toggle

profileOff.message:
Go To My Profile (OFF)
Status: OFF
Click to toggle

offMessage.message: The feature is disabled. Click on to activate.

tabOverviewDesc.message: Set the default tab to Overview.

tabRepositoriesDesc.message: Set the default tab to Repositories.

tabProjectsDesc.message: Set the default tab to Projects.

tabPackagesDesc.message: Set the default tab to Packages.

tabStarsDesc.message: Set the default tab to Stars.
